nope.text: Cheeky, but no. You cannae open this day until the date is correct.

days.text: We're going here today, and yes it has to be at a specific hour. Just go with it.
days.subtext: I wished we could have done this a little later, but we won't have time. Promise you won't ask any questions until we're there? üòò

days.text: You mentined this magazine aaaaaages ago, and I really like it, so I figured we could read some of it.
days.subtext: Check yo' email. (Actually, let me know when you've opened this, give me 5, THEN check yo' email üò¨)

days.text: This chick has some crazy playlists, and I thought of you so many times while I was going through her list.
days.subtext: 'Songs for short attention spans', 'cool key changes', and 'weird or changing time signatures' really made me think of you ‚ô™

days.text: I have a spesh pocket-sized security blanket for you. I was worried you might have found one earlier. But you changed you mind. Phew.
I had never seen this video, but I really enjoyed it in all its weird wonderfulness. Have to say though, our rendition of it on the bus was a trillion times better. Obvs.
I wanna take you to this expo, I know you're super into it and haven't seen it yet, so, tomorrow? Sunday?

Yay podcasts! I never really listen to them, but I think it's because I've also never really spent as much time looking into them as I did for this, so maybe there's something in finding some interesting ones.
days.subtext: I'm assuming that you'd be interested in one about the circle of fifths ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø

days.text: There are a lot of words and combinations thereof out in the world, and you introduced me to this super collection of them.
days.subtext: Now you have physical access to them, because paper üíï

days.text: Turns out I was wrong, Norbert does do dinner, not just high fives. We never did invite him over. But he's wonderful anyway üßÄ
days.subtext: (omg there's a channel dedicated to Norbert!!! üôä )

days.text: One year ago today, we talked about Zoetrope cakes! I thought you might appreciate a funky japanese one, with a christmas theme üéÑ
THAT is exactly what we were aiming for the night of our baloon battle. I figured we needed another go at mastering the skills, so, have some ballooners! üéà
Last we talked about the concept of Valentine's, was on Valentine's, and we said we should do cute things all days, not just one day. So have some cuteness and some candies üíì
Remind me to give you this ‚Üë today.
Long ago we spoke of the opportunity to run around as a goat, you seemed SO keen, I feel like you needed the chance üíï
days.subtext: So at 1pm today, you should be getting an email or summin' üò¨

days.text: You were right. This soundtrack is beautiful, so I'm dropping it in here as a reminder that we haven't watched this film yet, and I'd really like to.
There are no mistakes, only happy accidents. I really like this quote, and I like that Bob ross is your happy place.
days.subtext: So in the spirit of that, I got you a mini collection of little things that I think make you happy in that way.

days.text: Hi darling. A year ago, we held hands for the first time in the cinema, watching Arrival üíì. I thought you might enjoy listening to a break down of one of the songs from the film. I love you.
